Articles.Content:
Eve is nasty. It's thick atmosphere, tough terrain, and high drag make missions difficult(I have an Eve SSTO, so not too bad.) The challenge is that you must show your disappreciation for Eve, in one of several ways.

1.Bomb it with an E-class asteroid. 

Eve:You can't just bypass my atmosphere with a giant potatoroid!

Me:Potatoroid go brr...

2.Show your spite for it by building an SSTO.

Eve:You can't just bypass my atmosphere with a SSTO!

Me:Prop go brr...

3.Dump waste on the planet

Eve:Why are you just dumping your old comsats into my atmosphere?

Me:I'm just saving launch costs by not including enough fuel to go back to Kerbin.

4.Dump literal waste on the planet(Use a life support mod)

Eve:Why are you showering me with that yucky stuff?

Me:Don't mess with my craft again.

Eve:I won't please stop!

5.Memes

6.Impress me

7.General spite

8.Do something considered impossible, rocket only SSTO for example.

9.Ram spacejunk here

10.Go to Gilly instead.

Edited May 29, 2021 by Single stage to ocean
